summary: Cousins of the well-known Argonians, this esoteric group have been empowered by proximity to the Hist and come in vibrant blue colours, and now come with Dawnguard support!
descriptionHtml:
[color=gold][center][size=+1]Argonian Agaceph - Blue Argonian Enhanced Race
By Mayfly53[/size][/center][/color]

[i]"Cousins of regular Argonians, these have been strengthened by their proximity to the Hist, having diamond strong claws in addition to regular Argonian abilities. They can call upon the Histskin to regenerate health very quickly."[/i]

Introducing Argonians of the Agaceph tribe, an esoteric group who dwell in the heart of Argonia, close to the Hist itself.

This is a fully playable race, and since they are a type of Argonian, the people of Skyrim recognise and treat them as such.

This mod has been completely remade with support for Dawnguard and some vampirism mods such as Better Vampires. Issues from past versions should now be fixed. Please report any outstanding issues!

[color=cyan]This mod works with:
[list]
[*]Vanilla Skyrim without Dawnguard
[*]Skyrim with Dawnguard
[*]USKP and UFO
[*]Better Vampires and Vampiric Thirst
[/list]
Textures are available for:
[list]
[*]Vanilla regular and HD (both sexes)
[*]Sundracon's or FavouredSoul's meshes (males only; meshes must be installed seperately)
[/list][/color]

[color=red][center][size=+1]Attributes of the Agaceph:[/size][/center][/color]

Bonuses:
+10 Lockpicking
+10 Sneak
+5 Light Armour
+5 Destruction
+5 Restoration

Total = 35, balances with other races.

Needle Claws: "Claws of the Hist do more damage than those of lesser brethren."
This is essentially a remapping of the Khajiit race bonus, and so unarmed attacks will do 15 more damage than normal.

Disease Immunity: "Agaceph blood is immune to disease".
This grants a 100% resistance to disease, but may not affect the chances of becoming a vampire.

[color=red][center][size=+1]Installation:[/size][/center][/color]

Due to the archive setup and modular installation order, it is highly recommended to use NMM to install this mod.

[color=red][center][size=+1]Uninstallation:[/size][/center][/color]

Uninstall with NMM.

[color=red][center][size=+1]Credits:[/size][/center][/color]

To Xenius, for permission to edit and use their textures.
To expired6978, for their RaceCompatibility resource.
To TMPhoenix, for fixing RaceCompatibility for vampirism and Dawnguard.
To Luchaire at ModdersRealm, for their tutorial on proper custom race-texture matching.
To rabidbluedeath, for beta testing and bug reporting.

[color=red][center][size=+1]Changelog:[/size][/center][/color]

v2.0.1:
Corrected incorrectly uploaded esp.
Fixed mounted combat.
Fixed incorrect Race menu data.
Fixed human/ argonian helm mesh mismatch.

v2.0:
Completely remade the mod with support for Dawnguard.
Fixed vampirism and lycanthropy.
Fixed discolored headparts at base of horns (I hope!).

v. 1.1:
All options are now in one file with a scripted installer for NMM.
Tweaked bonuses and stats.

v. 1.0:
Initial release.
author: Mayfly53
